root.name: Siberian Strike
root.description: Gameloft S.A.'s Siberian Strike is a shoot-'em-up that takes places in an alternate world immediately after the end of World War II. The player flies into Siberian territory to face off against Russian forces. Â The game was generally positively received by mobile critics. Slide to Play and PocketGamer were two of the various outlets who gave glowing reviews.
